archimate:Requirement.name: AS.2.2.3f: f) specialist systems that are important to the organisation, such as industrial control systems (including programmable logic controllers (PLCs), distributed control systems (DCS) and SCADA systems)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
